title: I hate it when people say 'get better net'.
body:
As a humble estimate, at least 40% of the people on this server are Australian. Australia has some of the worst network infrastructure in the world - most of us are still using marginally outdated copper networks when the rest of the world has Optic Fibre.

Trying to imply that I'm poor because my net is slow (or vice versa) is just rude. All money can really buy you right now is data.

Any improvements to speed is dependant on time as Australia slowly upgrades to Optic Fibre (which is actually coming soon in my Post Code).

I have a very expensive computer which. I regularly upgrade components. I have a great router which supports 802.11ac wireless (gigabit speed not that I even use a wireless connection). Everything on my end is well above average and optimal standards.

The only time my net is EVER slow is if someone is using all of the bandwidth.

replies.body:
It's up to you to do research and determine the best possible connection to suit your needs, in this case the requirements are for gamng, if your internet isn't up to scratch or someone  else in the house is sharing the connection and using all the bandwidth well I'm sorry but thats not 9 other players problem, its yours.

Implying that it isn't your faault but someone else's is simply Rude , untrue and completely unfair


I completely agree tho that Australia needs a better infrastructure.
I mean like those random times where I'll spike for a second or two, die/miss an ability say 'lag' and get a response along the lines of 'gg noob get better net'.

I haven't lagged on league for 2+ years.
Get better net.
Vote tony Abbott out. That  way we'll all get better net.

Tell that to the dipshits that voted him in. I always vote labor. F*ck whatever 'bad' labor policy sheeple bitch about. On principle the average household should be voting Labor without question because the Liberals only do things that will benefit them.

Both the liberal party and the labour party are extremely conservative (why even bother calling it liberal)

Just vote whoever's first to come from neither.

> [{quoted}](name=A Blue Quaker,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6eeWZRE0,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-08-26T10:02:35.630+0000)
>
> Tell that to the dipshits that voted him in. I always vote labor. F*ck whatever 'bad' labor policy sheeple bitch about. On principle the average household should be voting Labor without question because the Liberals only do things that will benefit them.

Scary thought but its competely true

Most people don't know how to correctly vote.

hahahah bud they all only do what will benefit them they don't care bout us just as long as there making money we could all be dieing of the plague and if they getting money who cares rito do the same thing
Preaching to the choir here mate

You can't go and play Crysis with potatoes then complain that the game doesn't run very good at all on them, I am sure you understand.

Same thing with internet.

Does Aus need better infrastructure? Absolutely, but sadly if your net really isn't enough to let you play LoL, then it's probably a good idea to switch to games that don't require internet connections (or at least not online only).

> [{quoted}](name=A Blue Quaker,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6eeWZRE0,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-08-26T06:11:28.503+0000)
>
> All money can really buy you right now is data.

That's not true, money can move you to another country with better internet.
